website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking radio that will remind you of vintage models with rotary tuning.
pros: Radio is the perfect size to sit on a shelf or counter
Rotary tuning dial exudes a stylish, vintage look, as does the wood finish on the exterior of the radio
cons: Radio struggles to hold a clear signal position

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Audio with Punch!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! Radio, Has a full rich sound, Nice Bass, Music sounds awesome !! The build quality and feel of the knobs are like the way they use to manufacture radios. It nice have to a real ac cord that powers the radio, The ac cord. Does not introduce noise on the am band, Radio reception on fm is very good even the internal antenna. Come with a external antenna if you need it. Am reception is amazing!! I highly recommend this Radio, Don’t think about it, Just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: shai will

customer_reviews.title: Great radio at a great price for people who prefer a higher signal bass response
customer_reviews.text: I’m a radio guy who owns several including the : Tivoli model one ; by comparison neither have treble or bass controls. the factory signal eq’s are pre set . This model has a higher bass response but also has a digital tuner maintaining channel lock in eliminating Station drift the Tevoli analog tuner does not allowing for station drift ,should your preference lean to the treble side of your taste for sound qualities you might be happier with the Tivoli at a higher price range . personally I love the radio in a price range I would consider a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Michael Link

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a new small radio for my kitchen counter. The dark wood and black metal gives it a sleek appearance. I like to listen to AM sports talk radio and this radio has a bit too much bass for deep voices, but it's better than being too tinny. FM music sounds much better. It also has a green light signifying the strongest station signals so tuning in is easy to get the best reception. I also specifically wanted an analog radio so I could put a auto timer on the radio so it can off and on at specific times. Can't do that with a digital radio. Very happy I bought this more expensive radio.
customer_reviews.author: Quinndoggie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, performs well
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot to like about this radio. Attractive "retro" look, solidly build, good sound, and simple to operate. I particularly like the ability to use an external antenna. (The built-in antennas work fine for local stations). My one quibble is the tuning dial. The old-fashioned dial seems hard to read in an age of digital "exactness". For example, where exactly is 98.7 on the dial? You will probably just listen to a couple of favorite stations, and you will learn where they are on the dial. I wish I had the exact-same radio with digital tuning. But then it wouldn't look retro!
customer_reviews.author: David B. Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and quality
customer_reviews.text: When I got my radio I set the dial to my favorit FM station before pluging it in (eye balled). The station was right on , sound is great and reception is great. I am using the internal antenna and don't see using the external one. This radio will be on just about all day long. I was putting off purchasing this radio and I am pleased with the purchase. When you lift the radio you know that it's good quality by the weight and the wood case is well done.
customer_reviews.author: casual  reader.

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but this is a fine quality radio that sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: I actually own two of these fine quality Sangean radios -- and both work well and sound great. Yes, they are a bit pricey, but they are high-quality radios that look and sound great. These are not cheap plastic radios. They are sturdy, well-made and somewhat heavy. These tabletop radios are also handcrafted by skilled audio artisans. Okay, I made up that last line. But if it's not true, it should be. Regardless, I suspect no one will regret purchasing one of these radio gems.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy, but Honest

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for my older brother who is "tech impaired".  It is perfect for him
customer_reviews.text: If you have someone who loves the look of old radios, this is a perfect choice. My brother who recently had a stroke and is a bit hard of hearing received this as a Christmas present. It is perfect for him. AM/FM dial and volume control is all he needs. Also bought a pair of headphones so that he can hear and not have the volume at maximum. Very well made in a substantial wood like cabinet. Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at and great AM/FM sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a tabletop kitchen radio. It looks great, sounds great, pulls in my local AM talk radio, and a FM music station which my car radio has problems with fading. I really like the tuning and when you hit a station just right a red light comes on so you know thats the best sound for that station. I just bought another Sangean radio, this time a Pocket Radio SR 35 AM/FM Analog both from Amazon. Sound on the pocket radio is really great for such a small device and I love them both.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother, she loves the radio and listening to sports. Other radios that were cd combos were too hard, buttons too small. This one is attractive and fits very nicely on her shelf. She can see the dials and work it. She is 84 years old so the simpler the better and this fits the fill. She has even had compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Susane J. Gruning

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my mom as an old school gift and she loves it. The hand held buttons for tuning are just like the ones she used to have years ago when I was a child. The sound though, is new. The technology makes music sound amazing. Talk radio is clear. We couldn't be happier with this purchase. I may get one for myself just to have as a portable.
customer_reviews.author: A 1 LADY

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and great sound
customer_reviews.text: I am using the Sangean in my basement, and with the external antenna it has good reception. Mind you, I am not constantly changing channels. Although you can, but I believe a digital radio with presets would make it much easier. But this radio looks great. It is simple to use. A volume knob, am/fm off knob, and tuning knob. That's it! Simplicity at it's best!
customer_reviews.author: jfd1777

customer_reviews.title: great radio
customer_reviews.text: Best radio I've ever had, including the ones in my stereo receivers. Picks up every FM station in my area even without the antenna (which I haven't even hooked up yet because I don't need it). AM has some background humming but this may be due to local conditions or placement position. Superb bass response & excellent overall sound. Would have liked a treble control though.
customer_reviews.author: TRK6000

customer_reviews.title: awonderful performer for its size.
customer_reviews.text: It is beautifully made. Splendid exterior ... looks like quality. Controls are smooth. Superior sound for such a small, inexpensive item. Bass notes are extended by a port at the back. It picks up a good number of stations and does not drift. This is an extraordinary item. It is not super high end sound; but for its size. it is the best I've heard....exceeding my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Joel M. Lebow

customer_reviews.title: Good old fashioned radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radio just like the what grandma and grandpa listened to when I was a kid. Maybe better. Very nice looking. Seems to be pretty durable and well built. The sound is kind of a deeper tone, but I like it so that's ok. I've listened to AM talk shows on it just about everyday for several weeks now and I wonder how I ever got by without it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katfishcharlie

customer_reviews.title: A pretty nice radio for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by how nice this unit looked when I unpacked it. The cabinet could not possibly be wood, but it certainly looks like wood. As for the sound quality, it is fine. Not high-fidelity, of course, but I wasn't expecting that for the price. Overall, I'm happy with the purchase and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: DorianLS

customer_reviews.title: compact and can be left on the counter
customer_reviews.text: The sound is wonderful and this radio is what I have been looking for over the past 2 years. The tuning dial is helpful with the light to know you are on the channel fully. I'm only giving it a 4 star because I don't like that I have to have an antenna climbing up the wall, would rather it be built into the unit. However, I'm not a radio person so maybe that is the way for any radio. I'm just glad to have a radio again in my kitchen and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good audio, tuner leaves something to be desired.
customer_reviews.text: Tuner is not as sensitive as I hoped. I have three portable radios that pick up stations this table top radio will not, even with an external antenna and sitting on a window sill on an outside wall. Sound quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne A. Landerholm

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Radio!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a simple to use, AM/FM radio. This Sangean is great! I mainly use it in my office, so the volume never gets too high. It has a rich, deep base to it. Half the day it is on an AM station with talk radio. The other half on an FM station playing Jazz/Blues. Sounds fantastic. My biggest let down is that it doesn't pick up a Chicago station, 87.7 even though the listed frequency says it goes down to 87.5. This includes trying the external antenna. I highly recommend this radio.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Tabletop Radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio is of good quality as a tabletop radio -- a rare commodity in this world of boom boxes!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Goat

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with the sound quality. Easy to operate and to tune in a station. I don't need a antenna but it comes with one. Side note: we stream a lot of music on the weekend but I like to use this during the week for background music all day. Sound is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: Excellent reception. I was able to pull in stations ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent reception. I was able to pull in stations I've never heard before. Sound quality is also exceptional. The only slight issue I had was the wood on my unit was not nearly as dark as shown in the photo. More of a dark brown instead of black. Still, this radio has been a great addition to my office.
customer_reviews.author: IndyTennis

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this radio
customer_reviews.text: This is a great radio. It delivers excellent sound, especially for a smaller radio. I was pleasantly surprised. I purchased this to use at my office. It has a high quality wood cabinet that will blend nicely with my office furniture. About a year ago I purchased another, more retro look Sangean radio which is larger, very cool looking and with which I'm also quite pleased. However, in my opinion, this unit delivers superior sound. Try it, you'll like it!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Plankenhorn

customer_reviews.title: volume control broke
customer_reviews.text: was nice while it lasted (a year or so), but the volume control no longer works properly. sadly, out of warranty. my tivoli still going strong and sounding great. i guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: john mercer

customer_reviews.title: I wish the radio had base/trebel control
customer_reviews.text: The radio preset base is too much. I wish there was a control to adjust more to my liking. The radio is attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table-top AM/FM radio
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table-top AM/FM radio......construction quality seldom seen today.....sound fills the room, 6.5 watts output, the 4 inch internal speaker sounds GREAT! The tuning lock LED over the analog tuning knob is a nice touch.....really brings out the AM channels, that's why I bought this model..... HIGHLY recommend this radio, buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: anita

customer_reviews.title: WOW....does it sound good
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for JUST an AM/FM radio this thing is the real deal. I own two Bose Soundwave radios and this is a much better buy for the money if you are looking for high quality sound. I haven't tried it with my phone or an aux input but that's not why I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing Radio!
customer_reviews.text: The radio is solid and excellent quality and easy to operate. It is also a great gift for those who are not interested in digital technology but want a quality radio. I highly recommend! The reception is very good. Packaged nicely and quick ship time. The radio looks very nice, too!
customer_reviews.author: Squidders

customer_reviews.title: Compact yet sounds as if it were a big radio.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it's so compact and durable yet has a great sound. Great bass and overall sound both am/fm talk radio and music. I'll be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon S.

customer_reviews.title: Radio doesn't hold a station.
customer_reviews.text: AM band wonders around making you have to adjust the station constantly.
customer_reviews.author: E.G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Raido
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound. Great reception even with the internal antenna. Can't believe the bass response. You have to try the analog tuning dial to appreciate it. Very nice fine grain wood. Plan on getting two more!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Chicagoland

customer_reviews.title: Best radio I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best radio I"ve ever owned. "Bose" quality like sound, small, easy lettering to read, we even get AM now, before we couldn't even on our expensive receiver. Delighted!!!!!!! Thinking of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: OR nurse

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I’m super happy with it. Perfect size and GREAT sound. I have to use the antenna to get good reception but that’s not a problem. As you can see by the photo the box came damaged. No damage done to the unit. Speaker is worth what I paid which is $60
customer_reviews.author: LRC

customer_reviews.title: No A.M.
customer_reviews.text: The A.M. radio is utterly useless for me & that is why I purchased it so it really has no value for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. But the first 3 years ago. It still works fine. Looks good, sounds good. I live 50 miles from the radio station, and reception is very good. I bought an additional antenna,which is not needed as one comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: SGM HORNE

customer_reviews.title: Picks up stations easily
customer_reviews.text: The signal on my old radio faded in and out. This radio locks in on signals and the sound is great. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lorenzon

customer_reviews.title: An warm and elegant radio perfect for any home
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase! This is a lovely radio and the wood finish is so warm and elegant. And I appreciate how weighty and substantial it lools and feels. This seems a like a piece of technology that last a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: Henry D. Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and look - but quality of components is not good.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and look - but quality of components is not good. Within 2 months (and past the return window), the volume knob started shorting out, necessitating fiddling with the adjustment. Now it no longer works at all. There is no ability to correct this with the manufacturer or the seller. So, I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Analog Radior

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, sounds great! I have this in my basement "man cave". Nice size and all the stations come in fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Swoveland

customer_reviews.title: Rocking radio.
customer_reviews.text: This radio is amazing,the sound is awesome and it's clear listening even when cranked up on high volume, totally worth the money,lots of channels too.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Craddock

customer_reviews.title: AM reception.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to listen to local am but it doesn’t come through as good as the fm. However not perfect, it is ok as is, knowing that I live in an area that doesn’t typically get a good am signal. Would like to try an am antenna. Any recommendations? I’ve only had it for a week so I can’t speak much for durability, hence the 4 stars. All in all, it’s my best radio.
customer_reviews.author: BillyO

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for elderly parent and it is great. It is a heavier radio so that prevents it from being accidentally knocked off the table
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just love the sound from this Sangean WR-11 BK Wood Cabinet ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love the sound from this Sangean WR-11 BK Wood Cabinet in AM/FM Table Top the wood is not black more like walnut color lights up in green on AM/FM and it is on easy to use found this on amazon.com a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the second WR-11 that I have bought and I have one other Sangean radio. The company makes quality products.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C. McCurrie

customer_reviews.title: No Tone Control
customer_reviews.text: Good looking but no tone control. the sound particularly FM, has too much bass and there is no tone control nob to smooth out the sound. It makes listening to talk such as the news hard to understand and makes the music sound way to bassy.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Weil

customer_reviews.title: Awesome radio!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a good radio for the kitchen area & took a chance on this one & glad I did! Easy to use, tuner is great, great sound, love the looks, well made & decent price. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Steverino

customer_reviews.title: Very nice radio
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents, they are in their late eighties. They wanted something old school for their kitchen. They love it and it is easy for them to operate. The radio has good sound. Very nice
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: A classy, handsome radio
customer_reviews.text: Not may really nice table radios out there to choose from any more. This is one. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Helberg

customer_reviews.title: Radio
customer_reviews.text: I love it fits just were I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: too much base and over sensitive reception
customer_reviews.text: the sound is just too deep / low. it is not as crisp as it should be. to get good reception on local FM stations may be tricky.
customer_reviews.author: pfanian

customer_reviews.title: All mixed up!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice table top radio but when I ordered it for the limited black one, I ended up with the light stain one with the black face plate. Not only that wasn't what I wanted. The auxiliary Jack doesn't work. Other than them two problems it's really a nice radio.
customer_reviews.author: Toby Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Great am radio
customer_reviews.text: For our mom- she loved the look of this radio and it’s performing great. Definitely recommend this for the am lovers out there....
customer_reviews.author: LSN

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this radio. I mainly bought it because I like to listen to sportscasts that I can't get through Internet radio. This radio is attractive and tunes and pulls in stations very well. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the quality of sound for the price. Also, I think it's an attractive, sturdy little radio. The only thing is that the needle was slightly crooked, but I can live with it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: adacorn

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality, way too much bass.
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Very bassie... The biggest problem is way too heavy in the bass, treble not too much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Milano

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful radio!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 91 year-old mother. I wanted something that had good sound and was easy to use. This really is perfect. It has great sound. I’m going to get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Debbi

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the money
customer_reviews.text: My radio arrived as promised and works very well for my application. I use it in my garage listening to sports, talk radio and music. The radio has no problem locking into stations, has good sound quality and has more than enough volume for the garage.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and good sound!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my dad who is an avid sports radio listener but was using a falling apart, ugly boom box. He loves it, great sound, looks nice, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Majors

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding radio.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding radio. Tunes in most stations well without external antenna, but there was one weak one I had trouble with so I am using an antenna with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy, not complicated at all
customer_reviews.text: Item functions as described. Simple and easy, not complicated at all. Great office radio! Easybuy's service was expedient and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this radio, it sounds great, quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for people who have trouble manipulating buttons
customer_reviews.text: This is for an old person semi blind it's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Starlin

customer_reviews.title: Surprising good sound
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this radio. The sound quality is very impressive. I'm thinking about buying a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Sablain

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect that the sound would be so amazing. Love this radio and give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little radio
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a simple little AM/FM radio. That's exactly what I got. I did buy an external "Y" FM antenna just in case the single wire for FM that came with the radio was not suffice. As for the sound all I can say is if you buy this radio you will be amazed. Picks up stations OK So far 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: vahappy

customer_reviews.title: AM/FM Radio
customer_reviews.text: Item was exactly as described and made a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Tx

customer_reviews.title: CHRISTMAS GIFT
customer_reviews.text: Dont know yet. It's a Christmas gift. Like the looks of ot though.
customer_reviews.author: lcm965

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this sounds terrific for the price. It was packaged very well and showed zero signs of damage during shipping. I would highly recommend this for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice radio, occupies small space, good sound, very reasonably priced. Very satisfied with purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Love this radio!
customer_reviews.text: I listen to music in the background while I work. This radio looks beautiful on my new desk and sounds amazing. I have already received several compliments and being asked where I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Shena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Radio
customer_reviews.text: Reception and sound is excellent. Bought one in the fall and liked it so much I purchased a second later. Very attractive cabinet and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Turner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this radio
customer_reviews.text: TThought this would be much larger with better range of sound. It's really bad. WIsh I could send it back but I already threw out the packaging
customer_reviews.author: Pat Olson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the overall look of the radio. I liked the sound. I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kelsch

customer_reviews.title: Great Radio...super sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this little gem every day. Fantastic purchase. AM is a bit muted but FM Classical music 🎶 is amazing. If you are looking for a small retro type radio with no frills... can’t go wrong with this option.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M

customer_reviews.title: nice appearance and easy to use, and sound is good for a small unit.
customer_reviews.text: Would have prefered the Black Cabinet as ordered, however the dark walnut cabinet and sound iss with black face is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: There radio is great. Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: There radio is great. Sounds good. Dial stays on station well. And am very happy that it does not have electronic displays of any kind. The wood finish makes in blend in so it does not stand out like so many other music devices.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: radio
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my home office. external antenna jack makes finding stations easy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas J. Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Too much BASS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You can't turn off the BASS BOOST!!!!!! And the speaker's treble is too directional. A well built, but terrible radio.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L Cooper

customer_reviews.title: looks good, sounds good
customer_reviews.text: I liked this radio so much, that I bought a second one. The sound is very good. You can tell buy lifting this unit that it has some guts. Paul.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. Nice look.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my office and it looks good; eliciting a lot of positive comments. (Unlike so many cheap plastic am/fm radios these days) But more importantly, it sounds great. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Mom's Happy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 87 year old mother! In her words"I love it"
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Sounding Radio
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking on kitchen counter. Sounds great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Radio user

customer_reviews.title: GREAT RADIO. SOUNDS EXPECTED FROM MORE EXPENSIVE RADIOS
customer_reviews.text: GREAT RADIO. SOUNDS EXPECTED FROM MORE EXPENSIVE RADIOS...... ONLY PROBLEM AND NOT RADIO'S FAULT. WHEN YOU HAVE ARTHRITIS IN FINGERS IT IS HARD TO CONTROL YOUR HAND IN MOVING DIAL. THANK GOD WIFE LISTENS TO ONLY ONE RADIO STATION!....
customer_reviews.author: Louis R.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this radio for a while now and it's still working great. I like the retro look. The sound, tuning and volume are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Radio
customer_reviews.text: This radio did what I wanted. Good sound, good station reception (although not on the number for the station), small, fits where needed.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie Pruitt

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality! Cabinet is very nice, I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Doug White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Radio 👍
customer_reviews.text: This radio is AMAZING! The sound quality is unbelievable for a smaller radio with one speaker. Plus it looks really nice. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Buss

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!! I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this! Reasonably priced and awesome, big sound in a small package! Planning on buying a second one as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in AK

customer_reviews.title: A well made radio
customer_reviews.text: It is good radio but was ordered by mistake. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great radio!
customer_reviews.text: Great radio! Great sound! Just what I wanted. It was supposed to be black, but truthfully, it's dark brown, Kept it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Tipaldo

customer_reviews.title: good build quality and nice FM reception
customer_reviews.text: Full rich sound, good build quality and nice FM reception. All these benefits you get for half the price of comparable quality table top radios!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Liutongco

customer_reviews.title: Great radio
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the looks of this radio. This radio has preformed better than expected. The sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: they love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift to my parents, they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jock Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good reception (in a fairly rural area) and excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ciardiello

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful FM reception just plugging in the antennae
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful FM reception just plugging in the antennae. Would recommend this product wholeheartedly.
customer_reviews.author: M Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality. Seems to be well designed and constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hunting

customer_reviews.title: ... a nice-looking desktop radio so I could hear my favorite FM channel with no static
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a nice-looking desktop radio so I could hear my favorite FM channel with no static. This radio fits my needs. Fortunately, I purchased an antenna with the radio. I hooked up the radio and it was initially difficult to find a location on the dial that would hold the signal and be static-free. When I hooked up the antenna, the radio could hold the signal and be static-free. It's worth a few extra bucks to buy the antenna with this radio.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Turner

customer_reviews.title: Not bad radio
customer_reviews.text: For what i paid for this i must say its a pretty well built radio.I installed a ccradio twin coil ferrite antenna and i get stations from over 500 miles away at night.Some say it has to much bass on am but i think it sounds fine.I run it off a large rechargeable battery to help eliminate static.Sounds fine and is a great fm reciever.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E Choffin

customer_reviews.title: My New Radio Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I needed another kitchen radio to replace an undercabinet radio that had died. After a lengthy search online I chose this one because it’s compact, easy to use and design fit into my decor. Very nice bass tones. Good for FM.
customer_reviews.author: Ninevin

product_meta.title: Sangean WR-11BK Wood Cabinet AM/FM Table Top AM/FM Radio + Aux, Headphone Jack (Limited Edition Color)
product_meta.description: Style:WR-11-BK LIMITED EDITION Product Description Wood Am/FM Table Top Radio From the Manufacturer Elegant simplicity combined with state-of-the-art performance sets the Sangean Model WR-11 AM/FM Table Top Radio head and shoulders above the competition. In true Sangean tradition, AM/FM reception is excellent providing clear and static free listening. Wooden MDF Cabinet The wooden MDF cabinet material of the WR-11 not only makes for an elegant appearance, but improves sound quality due to its acoustically tuned design. Its dynamic bass compensation ensures rich sound anywhere. Tuning LED Indicator The WR-11 features a tuning LED indicator to help you know when you're getting the best reception possible from your antenna. Soft and precise tuning using the rotary dial makes it easy to achieve a strong, stable signal. Auxiliary Input for Portable Media Players The 3.5mm auxiliary input allows you to connect your favorite devices such as an iPod or other portable media player through that devices headphone output, so you can even enjoy your digital music library on the WR-11. Headphone Jack with Recording Output for External Devices The WR-11-BK offers a 3.5mm headphone jack for private listening of your favorite radio programming. A Record-Out output jack is also available to route your audio output to recording equipment or other devices. Technical Specifications Tuner: Analog AM/FM Presets: None Controls: Rotary dial with AM/FM selector switch Display: Analog band with backlight and LED tuning indicator Cabinet: Wooden MDF Speaker: 3" full-range driver (7W) Inputs: 3.5mm AUX-In Outputs: Record-Out, 3.5mm headphone jack Dimensions (WxHxD): 9-3/5" x 4-3/5" x 6-1/8" Weight: 5 lb 3.11 oz
feature_bullets: ► Table Top Radio Wooden MDF Cabinet, Soft and Precise Tuning, Rotary Tuning and Volume Controls
► Vernier Tuning Rotary dial with AM/FM Radio + Aux inputs + Headphone Jack inputs
► 3-Inch 7W Full Range Speaker with Enlarged Magnet
